title: Large man-like figure seen in the trees by a Marine training at Fort A. P. Hill
observed: This report was originally submitted by email and later investigated by telephone. "I am a former United States Marine who in 2008 had a very compelling sighting of what can only be discribed as a Bigfoot. I am willing to tell my story once I am contacted and also I have two other US Marines that saw the same being. I can assure you that I am 100 percent honest with what I saw and that I can provide proof of my credentials and location."
location_details: Military Installation, during a training operation no one outside of the military had access to this location.
